issue.summary: discrepancy (indel) of 1 bp between human chr7 genomic clone AC004857.1 and transcripts
issue.description: Disagreement between all mRNAs and ESTs matching the ETV1 locus on human chr7 genomic clone AC004857.1 suggest a missing G in the genomeic sequence.
issue.resolution_text: This is a conserved non-canonical splice site, and no change will be made here for GRCh38.

issue.description: Discrepancies between NM_001177506.1 (AOAH) and the genomic region to which it aligns suggest two possible single nucleotide sequencing errors in GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF454909.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference in order to correct two single nucleotide deletions and provide better representation for GeneID: 313 (AOAH) for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113913 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.9 unlocalized scaffold NT_113913 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC079999.4).
issue.resolution_text: NT_113913 (AC079999.4) is redundant within AC110072.3, which has been added to the Chr. 7 reference, extending into the centromere for GRCh38.

issue.description: possible missed join
issue.resolution_text: A join does not exist between AC024730.7 and AC142230.3, and the gap size has been updated to 4.8kb by Optical Map data.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Part of TCR beta locus missing
issue.description: Part of the TCR beta locus that was present in NCBI36 is missing in GRCh37
issue.resolution_text: The missing TCR beta locus has been restored in GRCh37 Patch Release 3, genbank accession GL582971.1, as reported in ticket HG-7.

issue.status_text: WGS contigs ABBA01017246.1 and ABBA01017247.1 have been added for GRCh38, extending towards the centromere.
issue.description: Chromosome 7 sequence does not extend into centromeric repeat on one side of the centromere.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Sequence is missing from NM_020979.2 (SH2B2) when aligned to the reference assembly, suggesting some sequence is missing from the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: This patch corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000007.13, in component AC005088.3, affecting GeneID: 10603 (SH2B2).

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC211775.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383534.1 created to capture sequence from AC211775.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: The fosmid clone AC211775.3 (ABC10-44706000F12) contains ~6 kb that does not align to reference component AC004918.1 (RP5-894A10). This patch was updated in release 7 to update the distal trim on AC004918.1 so that the extent used matches the GRCh37 chr. 7 reference chromosome.

issue.description: NM_006060.2 aligns across assembly gap of AC142233.3 and AC124014.3
issue.resolution_text: Further efforts to close this gap will be tracked in HG-734.

issue.summary: Retiling through the Williams Region with a Single Haplotype Pathway
issue.description: Repetitive structure and mixed libraries in the Williams region result in a possible lack of representation of a true haplotype and a recalcitrant gap.
issue.resolution_text: CH17 clones have been sequenced in the duplicated regions of the Williams Region and replace the clones from mixed haplotypes in these two locations: between AC091738.4 - AC005049.2 and between AC004851.2 - AC004491.2.

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between components AC144863.1 and AC145656.3. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap caused by a false join reported in HG-182.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000058.1 spans the gap between Chr. 7 components AC144863.1 and AC234644.1 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chr. 7 Reference Assembly Gap Associated with GeneID: 26958 (COPG2)
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between AC144863.1 and AC145656.3, originally described in HG-182, and then in HG-1307. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between AC144863.1 and AC145656.3, originally described in HG-182, and then in HG-1307. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: ABBA01015547.1, AEKP01153556.1, AEKP01153555.1, ABBA01039274.1
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC145676.2 and AC187652.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-732.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC147553.2 and AC232988.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-739.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000059.1 spans the gap between Chr. 7 components AC147553.2 and AC232988.1 for GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC233268.2 and AC124014.3. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-734.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000057.1 spans the gap between Chr. 7 components AC233268.2 and AC124014.3 for GRCh38.

issue.description: Possible missing sequence from AC069292.12, affecting PEG10 (GeneID:23089)
issue.resolution_text: Closing issue, as it is out of scope for GRC.

issue.description: The reference may be representing the non-protein-coding allele of GeneID:1577 (CYP3A5)
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459642.1 has been generated and added to patch the Chr. 7 Reference component AC005020.5, updating this base to represent the coding allele for GeneID: 1577 (CYP3A5) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC091742.5 - AC093659.4 region of Chr. 7. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: The reference has been replaced with the single haplotype CH17 Pathway in this region. Alt_loci have been created to ensure representation of the TRB gene locus, tracked in HG-7.

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC091768.4 - AC004534.1 region of Chr. 7 . These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_020223.1 has a large unaligned 3'end on reference assembly gap of AC145676.2 and AC147651.4
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of the following components to the right side of this gap, NM_020223.1 (FAM20C) is completely represented in GRCh37: AC187652.1, AC187653.1, AC188616.2, AC226118.2, AC188617.2, AC148337.2. Further efforts to close this gap will be tracked in HG-732.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP3A4 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP3A4 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP5A1 is not the clinical standard
issue.status_text: Mini contig KF459643.1 addresses rs5768 and has been added for GRCh38. Changes were not made for the other two reported base differences between the clinical standard and the reference.
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP5A1 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion within AC073057.6
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clone AC237221.3 corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000007.13, in component AC073057.6.

issue.description: There is a type 2 gap between AC123577.3 and AC124008.4.
issue.resolution_text: The left gap-flanking component AC123577.3 has been moved, extending into a gap from AC128676.2 for GRCh38. The right gap-flanking component AC124008.4 has been removed as redundant within the extending clones AC129338.2 to the left, and AC245132.2 to the right. This rearrangement was investigated in HG-1671.

issue.description: There is a Type 2 gap between AC124008.4 and AC019340.6.
issue.resolution_text: AC245132.2, AC123577.3, and AC128676.2 extend into this gap for GRCh38. AC124008.4 has been removed as redundant. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-2286.

issue.description: The 5' end of NM_152701.2 extends into the assembly gap of AC122132.5 and AC073424.8
issue.resolution_text: We have generated and submitted PCR product FJ770081 that spans and closes the Reference Assembly gap. This PCR product spans from AC232312 ABC9-45917700B11 to AC232300 ABC8-738922J3.

issue.description: NM_178562.2 does not align to the genome sequence, possible internal deletion on AC011005.7
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig ABBA01057643.1 has been added to the Chr. 7 Reference in order to patch this small deletion in NC_000007.13 component AC011005.7 and provide better representation for GeneID: 340348 (TSPAN33) in GRCh38.

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion within AC105446.4.
issue.resolution_text: A problem region was reported in Build36 associated with what was suspected to be a false join between AC118759.3 and AC105446.4. A gap was inserted for GRCh37, and RP11-1433B22 was selected for sequencing. This clone has been finished as AC254629.1 for GRCh38 and replaces GRCh37 component AC118759.3 to close the gap between AC011895.3 and AC105446.4 within GRCh37 positions NC_000007.13:100,500,000-100,800,000. This pathway's validity will be further investigated in linked ticket HG-2313.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC104073.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC104073.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC104073.3 will be used through its overlap with AC092685.2 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC142169.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC142169.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC142169.2 will be used through its overlap with AC231985.2 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC188617.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC188617.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC188617.2 will be used through its overlap with AC226118.2 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible decoy localization
issue.description: The assembly of AC019340, which may belong near the Chr. 7 centromere, is being reviewed.
issue.resolution_text: A misassembly in Chr. 7 component AC019340.6 has been fixed and this clone resubmitted. Decoy containing clone AC127701.2 has been placed overlapping AC019340.7, and the clones in between the two heterochromatin gaps here have been rearranged and several previously unlocalized clones placed here.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC093614.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC093614.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC093614.4 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238737.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238737.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC238737.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC099395.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC099395.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: This decoy has been captured and can be found in GRCh38 component AC245427.3.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC093666.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC093666.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC093666.4 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216130.5 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216130.5 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC216130.5 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC236756.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC236756.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC236756.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC237044.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC237044.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC237044.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.description: Exons 10-20 of NM_012133.3 (COPG2) are missing from the reference assembly. There is no gap here, suggesting a possible wrong join.
issue.resolution_text: A gap was inserted here for GRCh37. Component AC090520.1 was removed from the TPF and replaced by several other components and a type-2 gap, and AC144863.1 was added to the left side of this gap. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1307.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_198455.2 (SSPO) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible bad join between AC007078.4 and AC004980.5
issue.resolution_text: Component AC004980.5 is an RP5 clone, and there is some evidence that the ~12kb insertion it contains (NC_000007.13: 76,140,000-76,160,000) relative to other sequences is a valid allele. AC237298.3 has been added as an ALT for GRCh38 to capture a deletion allele which gives better representation for NM_030570.2 (UPK3B).

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC004929.2
issue.status_text: This discrepancy is being investigated to determine whether it may be variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267013.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 7, suggest there may be ~2,415 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC004929.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC004852.2
issue.description: Analysis of GU267658.1, GU267709.1, and GU267796.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 7, suggest there may be ~6,524 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC004852.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC007128.2
issue.description: Analysis of GU268914.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 7, suggest there may be ~2,480 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC007128.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC073468.9
issue.description: Analysis of GU266915.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 7, suggest there may be 4,150 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC073468.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: AUXG01000062.1 replaces NC_000007.14 component AEKP01160869.1 to remove IUPAC ambiguity codes found at NC_000007.14: 154,575,459; 154,578,615; 154,578,614; and 154,578,679.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC002381.1
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC002381.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a type-2 Reference Assembly gap between AC245132.2 (CH17-102I6) and AC123577.3 (CTD-2415C3). WGS contigs ABBA01032025.1 and ABBA01032024.1 have been added to this gap for GRCh38. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-1478.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There may be a collapsed duplication, deletion, or false join from approximate positions NC_000007.14: 100,750,000-101,100,000. This ticket will track the continued effort to correct the problem region reported in HG-15.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Best Representation for GeneID: 80761 (UPK3B) found on ALT
issue.description: GeneID: 80761 (UPK3B) has its best representation on ALT_LOCI NT_187561.1 for GRCh38, which contains a ~12kb deletion allele relative to the primary assembly (see HG-194). This ticket will track the discussion on whether the deletion allele that provides better gene representation should replace the primary assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AC010973.7 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AC010973.7 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: This version update was recorded in HG-866, and no further curation is needed.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC019340.7 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AC019340.7 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: This version update was recorded in HG-1671, and no further curation is needed.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_001099942.1 (GRIFIN) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459637.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to correct a single nucleotide deletion and improve representation for GeneID: 402635 (GRIFIN).

issue.description: AC011895.4 possible internal deletion based on MUC3A
issue.resolution_text: Work on this problem region will be tracked in linked ticket HG-15

issue.description: MUC3B is not annotated in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Work on this problem region will be tracked in linked ticket HG-15

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113902 (component: AC144526.2) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 7
issue.resolution_text: AC144526 has been found to be redundant, the misassembly is most likely due to AC144526 being a Draft clone. This sequence is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Fiber FISH experiments indicate sequence is missing in reference at the 7q22 mucin locus
issue.description: Fiber FISH suggests some missing sequence at the mucin locus.
issue.resolution_text: Work on this problem region will be tracked in linked ticket HG-15.

issue.summary: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference
issue.description: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference.
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC217018.3 has been added to the TPF as a contained clone to patch this deletion. HG-946 was used to track this TPF change.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004956.3 (ETV1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Investigation of this discrepancy at position 13917389 of Build 36 will continue in ticket HG-100, which reports the same issue.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003386.1 (ZAN) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF570250.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to update this base in order to provide functional representation for GeneID: 7455 (ZAN) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003777.3 (DNAH11) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: This discrepancy was based on a region of low quality sequence in a submitted cDNA. There is no error in the reference sequence.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_014817.3 (KIAA0644) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02015433.1 has been added to the Chr. 7 Reference in order to update the two bases reported in this ticket to the more common allele and provide better representation for GeneID: 9865 (KIAA0644).

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_032172.2 (USP42) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AC004895.2 has been updated to AC004895.3 with the correction of the missing base.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_032534.2 (KRBA1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459639.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference in order to correct a single nucleotide deletion, providing better representation for GeneID: 84626 (KRBA1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_133457.2 (EMID2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573644.1 has been generated and added to the Chr.7 Reference for GRCh38 to update this single nucleotide deletion to the more common insertion allele and provide better representation for GeneID: 136227 (COL26A).

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001110199.1 (FLJ37078) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573703.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 222183 (FLJ37078).

issue.summary: Low quality alignment between AC118759.3 and AC105446.4
issue.description: The alignment between AC118759.3 and AC105446.4 is incompatible with contig building
issue.resolution_text: A gap was inserted between AC118759.3 and AC105446.4 for GRCh37 while the MUC3/3A/3B continues to be investigated. See HG-15, HG-257, HG-258 and HG-277.

issue.summary: 13 bp deletion in AC104073.3 affecting a gene .
issue.description: a 13 bp deletion in human chr 7 BAC AC104073.3 is not supported by any transcript and affects the translation of a gene.
issue.resolution_text: The genome at this location is supported by RP11 and 1kG whole genome data, and the gene that spurred the report is likely a pseudogene. No changes will be made.

issue.summary: 1 bp deletion in BAC AC104057.4 affecting GeneID: 644619 (INTS4L2)
issue.description: Human chr7 BAC AC104057.4 has a 1 bp deletion compared to all transcripts that match that location. This is in a coding exon of a gene (cDNA BC111554.1) .
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of component AC073107.7, which agrees with the transcripts at this location, will be used through this overlap.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC142456.2 and AC122133.4.
issue.resolution_text: The reported Optical Map size of this gap is 8.5kb. AC069152.5 now spans this gap with 13.5kb of unique sequence.

issue.summary: Lack of alignment/certificate for AF093117.1 and AC079255.5 precludes contig building
issue.description: Lack of alignment/certificate for AF093117.1 and AC079255.5 precludes contig building
issue.resolution_text: certificate submitted and approved.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC024730.7and AC142230.3.
issue.resolution_text: The gap size between AC024730.7and AC142230.3 has been updated to 4.8kb by Optical Map data. This TPF change has been tracked in HG-103. The efforts to close this gap will be tracked in HG-740.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC144438.2 and AC142169.2.
issue.resolution_text: We have generated and submitted PCR product FJ770082 that spans and closes this gap. FJ770082 spans AC231970 ABC11-48028000K17 and AC231985 ABC11-49495200M1.

issue.summary: AC010991.4 and AC004936.2 short join polymorphism is problematic for contig building
issue.description: AC010991.4 and AC004936.2 short join polymorphism is problematic for contig building
issue.resolution_text: AC010991.4 has been fixed and resubmitted as AC010991.5 increasing the overlap to 20KB.

issue.summary: pair of indels in AC005013.3 affecting KIAA0644 gene.
issue.description: A deletion followed by an insertion s in human chr7 BAC AC005013.3 affects the translation of the KIAA0644 gene.
issue.resolution_text: The continued investigation of this issue will be tracked in linked ticket HG-340, which refers to the same indels.

issue.summary: AC188618.1 and AC226118.2 align in more than one orientation
issue.description: AC188618.1 and AC226118.2 align to one another in more than one orientation
issue.resolution_text: Clone AC188618.1 has been found to be redundant and removed from the TPF

issue.status_text: Several CHORI-17 clones have been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AC093668.4 and AC006477.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: 1 bp deletion in AC004840.4 affecting GRIFIN gene
issue.description: 1 bp deletion in chr 7 BAC AC004840.4 affecting GRIFIN gene translation.
issue.resolution_text: The investigation of this discrepancy will be tracked in HG-253

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113900 may be allelic or redundant to reference telomeric region
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113900 may be allelic or redundant to reference telomeric region
issue.resolution_text: AC006476.3 (RP4-764O12) has been found to be redundant to the telomere representation on the reference (AF027390.1) and is not need.

issue.summary: possible substitution in AC078847 affecting AKR1B10 gene
issue.description: possible 1 bp substitution in AC078847 affecting the translation of the AKR1B10 gene (D to N substitution).
issue.resolution_text: According to 1000 Genomes data, the frequency for the current reference allele is 9% in the CEU population. Since the reference is the major allele in at least one population, this issue will be resolved with no change.

issue.description: AC025594.5 has a 1-nt insertion and a 1-nt deletion compared to NM_199349.2
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF510975.1 and KF495713.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to correct a single nucleotide insertion and a single nucleotide deletion to improve representation for GeneID: 375616 (CRIM2).

issue.summary: Substitution in AC083862.2 in coding exon of TMEM140
issue.description: Human chr7 BAC AC083862.2 contains a substitution causing a codon change from L to F in the translation of the TMEM140 gene.
issue.resolution_text: According to 1000 Genomes data, the frequency for the current reference allele is 24% in the YRI population. Since the reference is the major allele in at least one population, this issue will be resolved with no change.

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion within U66059.1
issue.resolution_text: This ALT_LOCI provides a single library representation of the TRBV region, in contrast to the conglomerates of YACs from mixed libraries that represented this region in GRCh37 NC_000007.13. The reference has been replaced with the single haplotype CH17 Pathway in this region, tracked in HG-1336.

issue.summary: Ambiguous alignment between AC073264.5 and AC106862.3
issue.status_text: CHORI-17 clones have been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: Ambiguous alignments for components AC073264.5 and AC106862.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145676.2 and AC147651.4
issue.resolution_text: Several clones extend into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1309.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC122132.5 and AC073424.8
issue.resolution_text: We have generated and submitted PCR product FJ770081 that spans and closes the Reference Assembly gap. This PCR product spans from AC232312 ABC9-45917700B11 to AC232300 ABC8-738922J3.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142233.3 and AC124014.3
issue.resolution_text: AC233268.2 was sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1313.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142456.2 and AC122133.4
issue.resolution_text: This patch replaces the phase 2 sequence AC160848.1 found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000007.13 with phase 3 sequence AC069152.5.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC147553.2 and AC141932.2
issue.resolution_text: AC232988.1 has been sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1312.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC024730.7 and AC142230.3
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01160869.1 spans this gap and is supported by Optical Map data.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC144652.1 and AC142169.2
issue.resolution_text: We have generated and submitted PCR product FJ770082 that spans and closes this gap. FJ770082 spans AC231970 ABC11-48028000K17 and AC231985 ABC11-49495200M1.

issue.summary: substitution (polymorphic?) in chr7 BAC AC006330.5 in TMEM120A
issue.description: substitution (T to C) (polymorphic?) in human chromosome 7 BAC AC006330.5 in a coding exon of the TMEM120A gene creates a stop codon.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495978.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 reference in order to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 83862 (TMEM120A).

issue.description: Mismatch between the RefSeq for TMEM120A (NM_031925.1) and the genomic component to which it aligns (AC006330.5) that affects coding sequence.
issue.resolution_text: The investigation of this issue will be tracked in duplicate ticket HG-770.

issue.description: A to G substitution affecting poly-A signal in human chromosome 7 BAC AC018634.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459645.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 51314 (TXNDC3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: 1 bp deletion in BAC AC011895.4 in ACHE gene
issue.description: Human chromosome 7 BAC AC011895.4 has a 1bp deletion of a "G" in the 5' UTR of the ACHE gene.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF510962.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to correct the base at rs66793456 and improve representation for GeneID: 43 (ACHE) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: 1 bp deletion in BAC AC011895.4 in ARS2
issue.description: Human chromosome 7 BAC AC011895.4 has a 1bp deletion of a "G" in the 5' UTR of the ARS2.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459632.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for GeneID: 51593 (SRRT).

issue.description: GRCh37 has a 1 nt deletion and several mismatches in reference component BACs AC105447.4 and AC091738.4 that disrupt the reading frame of TYW1B.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC211469.4 will be used through its overlap with AC091738.4 in GRCh38 Chromosome 7 in order to provide better representation for GeneID: 441250 (TYW1B).

issue.summary: insertion in AC010973.6 affecting a gene.
issue.description: Possible 1bp insertion affecting the translation of a putative new gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459644.1 has been generated and added to patch the Chr. 7 Reference component AC010973.6, updating the base at rs11403989 to the more common allele and correcting the reading frame for GeneID: 392843 (IQCA1P1) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: deletion in clone AC010973.6 affecting ATG9B gene translation
issue.description: Human chr7 BAC AC010973.6 contains a deletion of a "G" in a coding exon of the ATG9B gene
issue.resolution_text: This issue describes the same discrepancy as HG-866, in which all further work on this issue will be reported.

issue.description: Discrepency between published cDNA and genomic sequence AC004895.2
issue.resolution_text: AC004895.2 has been update to AC004895.3 with the correction of the missing base.

issue.description: Human chr7 BAC AC010973.6 contains a deletion of a "G" in a coding exon of the ATG9B gene
issue.resolution_text: NC_000007.13 component AC010973.6 has been updated to AC010973.7 to correct the single nucleotide deletion found in this clone and to provide correct representation for GeneID: 285973 (ATG9B) for GRCh38.

issue.description: The previous RefSeq for CYP3A7, NM_000765.2, has three mismatches versus the reference genome. All mismatches are known SNPs.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF454904.1 and KF459646.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference, updating three bases in component AC069294.5 to represent the clinical allele for GeneID: 1551 (CYP3A7) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between NM_001098631.1 (IRF5) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns, resulting in a non-consensus splice site.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459647.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference for GRCh38 to update this base that was causing a non-consensus splice site in GeneID: 3663 (IRF5).

issue.description: NM_001127441.1 (CPA5) aligns to NC_000007.13 with a nonconsensus splice site.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495711.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 7 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 93979 (CPA5) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Alignment to HuRef suggests ~31kb may be missing from AC095044.3
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clone AC217018.3 corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000007.13, in component AC095044.3.

issue.description: A portion of XM_001722348.2 (LOC653375) may not be completely represented due to an assembly gap.
issue.resolution_text: This region has been re-tiled with CHORI-17 clones, which was tracked in HG-1257. This gap no longer exists, and the RefSeq is completely represented in the new pathway.
